text: A gubernatorial election was held on 7 April 2019 to elect the next Governor of Osaka. == Candidates == *Hirofumi Yoshimura, for Nippon Ishin no Kai. *Tadakazu Konishi back by LDP, Komeito, DPFP. == Results == http://shingetsunewsagency.com/2019/04/13/conservative-landslide-in-unified- local-elections/ == References == Category:2019 elections in Japan Category:Osaka gubernatorial elections Category:April 2019 events in Japan
title: 2019 Osaka gubernatorial election
